Sam Kim

Introduction

Sam Kim is an American singer-songwriter, producer, and guitarist based in South Korea. He gained recognition as the runner-up of the talent show K-pop Star 3. He is signed to Antenna Music and made his official debut on April 10, 2016, with the EP I Am Sam, followed by his studio album Sun and Moon on November 22, 2018.

Sam Kim is widely known for contributing to popular K-drama soundtracks, including "Love Me Like That" for the Netflix drama Nevertheless in 2021, and "Say You Love Me" for the 2022 drama My Demon.
